nodes.text: Lan Starburn was a Human male prison guard from Alderaan who guarded in the Desolation Alley and was also a correctional officer during the waning years of the Galactic Republic. In 32 BBY, he was wanted by Gardulla the Hutt for the disruption of a 2 million credit spice smuggling operation out of Tatooine.
Lan Starburn's bounty was 3,000 credits alive and 1,500 credits dead.
